summary:
Experienced Principal Production Geologist, Project Manager and Petroleum Economist in International Oil & Gas projects. 

Strong background in GeoSciences, Field Development Planning, Petroleum Economics and Portfolio Management.

Experienced Project Leader of Field Development Teams covering the entire asset life-cycle.

Comes from a business family and is entrepreneurial, practical and down-to-earth. Has expertise in both Technical and Commercial domains to economically develop oil & gas assets.
 
Extensive capability in leading multi-cultural and multi-disciplinary teams.

Has working experience in both Operating Unit and Joint Venture environments, globally.
